summary: Hardrock minerals, like gold and copper, are crucial for modern technology. But mining can create lasting health hazards and contamination. This report describes, among other things, stakeholder views on management of hardrock mining on federal lands. Industry stakeholders emphasized a need for certainty—in knowing, for example, that lands will be open for exploration and can be developed. title: Federal Land Management: Key Differences and Stakeholder Views of the Federal Systems Used to Manage Hardrock Mining
